body_html:
Did you try isolating the issue, by looking at the two reshaped features and compare differences? That might uncover bugs/issues better than comparing the end-to-end accuracy.

(I expect them to be equal. And the differences in accuracy are just...machine learning? =D Did you train the tf.reshape version to full?)
body_text:
Did you try isolating the issue, by looking at the two reshaped features and compare differences?  That might uncover bugs/issues better than comparing the end-to-end accuracy.
(I expect them to be equal.  And the differences in accuracy are just...machine learning? =D Did you train the tf.reshape version to full?)
body:
Did you try isolating the issue, by looking at the two reshaped `features` and compare differences?  That might uncover bugs/issues better than comparing the end-to-end accuracy.

(I expect them to be equal.  And the differences in accuracy are just...machine learning? =D Did you train the `tf.reshape` version to full?)
